rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across a study for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: SCSEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject. This is not the treatment group number.
datasetVariables.label: Group Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SCGRPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89981

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in SCTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in SCTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). SCTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Some extensible controlled values are: SPLRNAM, SPLRLOC, HAIRCOLR.
datasetVariables.label: Subject Characteristic Short Name
datasetVariables.name: SCTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89980

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCTEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for SCTESTCD. The value in SCTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: Test Subject Supplier, Test Subject Supplier Site, and Hair Coat Color.
datasetVariables.label: Subject Characteristic
datasetVariables.name: SCTEST

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the subject characteristic as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Findings as Collected
datasetVariables.name: SCORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCORRESU

datasetVariables.description: The unit for the original result. The unit of the original result should be mapped to a synonymous unit on the Controlled Terminology (http://www.cdisc.org/terminology) list.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Original Result
datasetVariables.name: SCORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from SCORRES in a standard format or standard units. SCSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in SCSTRESN. For example, if a test has results NONE, NEG, and NEGATIVE in SCORRES, these results effectively have the same meaning. In this case, they could be represented in standard format in SCSTRESC with a single term NEGATIVE.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: SCSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for numeric results or findings in standard format; contains the numeric form of SCSTRESC. SCSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Numeric Format
datasetVariables.name: SCSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for SCSTRESC and SCSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Standardized Result
datasetVariables.name: SCSTRESU

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.RPHASE

datasetVariables.description: Name of the Reproductive Phase associated with the date/time of the observation. RPHASE is Required when any Repro Phase timing variable is used.
datasetVariables.label: Reproductive Phase
datasetVariables.name: RPHASE

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/Time of collection of the subject characteristic information, in ISO 8601 format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Collection
datasetVariables.name: SCDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of collection, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Collection
datasetVariables.name: SCDY

modelClassVariable.title: Actual Repro Phase Day of Observation

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SC.SCRPDY

self.title: Actual Repro Phase Day of Observation

datasetVariables.description: The actual day within the Reproductive Phase on which the observation occurred. Expressed as an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Actual Repro Phase Day of Observation
datasetVariables.name: SCRPDY

description: A findings domain that contains subject-related data not collected in other domains. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C49610, 2018-06-29)
label: Subject Characteristics
name: SC
